mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PAYMENT ( ID, PAYMENT_PRICE, PAYMENT_TYPE, PAYMENT_STATUS, PAYMENT_CREATE_AT, ORDER_ID) VALUES ( SEQ_PAYMENT.NEXTVAL, #{paymentPrice}, #{paymentType}, #{paymentStatus}, SYSDATE, #{orderId} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID, PAYMENT_PRICE, PAYMENT_TYPE, PAYMENT_STATUS, PAYMENT_CREATE_AT, ORDER_ID FROM TBL_PAYMENT WHERE ORDER_ID = #{orderId} ORDER BY ID DESC
